attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HM revenue & custom mileage rates & allowances have not been altered since 2003 & as such, are stuck at 40p, despite the cost of petrol increasing by 46% in the period. The true rate should, therefore, be 58p.

Once again, the government is simply ripping us off!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
